Text.Value: A moment, Jeorna.
I'm not looking for trouble. Can't you just let me by?
Leave.
Attack them.
No need for threats. Why can't I move around freely here?
Calm, Maggran. Give him a chance.
Calm, Maggran. Give her a chance.
Calm, Maggran. Give them a chance.

EditorData.AnimationTags: CDavis:The druid guard raises a calming hand to her bear colleague, stilling him.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The druid guard raises a hand to her bear colleague, stilling him.
EditorData.NodeContext: She's addressing the bear, but 'give him/her a chance' is more for the player's benefit.

Text.Value: Druid or not, you're still an outsider to this place. Entry is forbidden.
What...? Why would she allow one of them? I... I suppose so, yes.
What...? Oh. I understand.

EditorData.AnimationTags: CDavis: Mino wispering into Jeorna's ear. Jeorna glances startled at the player upon hearing this.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Mino whispers something inaudible to Jeorna, who glances at you with realisation of something.

Text.Value: *Roar!*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Extra-hostile. Combat breaks out immediately after this node.

Text.Value: You - apparently Kagha wants to see you. Go ahead.

EditorData.AnimationTags: CDavis: Jeorna reluctantly waves the player forward to enter the sanctuary.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Jeorna's attention is fully with the player again. She waves them through the checkpoint.
EditorData.NodeContext: Sudden change of tone. She bruskly allows the player to pass.

Text.Value: Stop! Move back at once. We'll not tolerate drow in our grove.
Stop! Move back at once.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Player is in the trigger S_DEN_PondTrespassBox

Text.Value: Keep back. Force my hand, and I'll show you its claws.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Bear-druid glowers menacingly when druid says 'show you its claws'.

Text.Value: Stop! Another step and Maggran will tear you open like a sack of grain.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gestures towards the bear on 'and Maggran'.
EditorData.NodeContext: Anger starting to boil over. Between the refugees and us, she's had enough of outsiders and their demands, Stop is addressed to the player - they're pushing their luck and Jeorna's bear-druid colleague is ready to rip them apart.

Text.Value: Ignore them and proceed.
It's forbidden to outsiders - Kagha's orders.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Bear-druid glowers menacingly when druid says 'see what happens'

Text.Value: I am a druid first, tiefling second. Allow me to enter and pay my respects.
I am a druid first, drow second. Allow me to enter and pay my respects.
I am a druid, same as yourself. Allow me to pass and pay my respects. Please.
You - step back. Go join the other tieflings.
You - step back. We'll not tolerate drow in here.
You - get back.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Jeorna (druid1) turns to address the player.

Text.Value: *Roar!*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The bear roars and looms ferociously.

Text.Value: If it weren't for me, you'd be overrun by goblins by now. I'll go where I please.
No. And you'll find trouble all the same, unless you get out of my sight.
*Roar!*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Threatening roar + aggressive stance from the bear/druid. But he doesn't attack.

Text.Value: You're testing my patience. Leave, unless you want to see my other face.
But a word of warning. One wrong move and every single animal here will tear you apart.

EditorData.NodeContext: This is an extra warning spoken to drow players in particular - Jeorna (and many others) consider them a threat.

Text.Value: Why? What's so special down here?

Synopsis: Three druids guard the entrance to the inner part of their sanctuary, blocking any outsiders. They're on edge, having recently driven back some outraged tiefling refugees who know the druids hold one of their children captive. One of the druids transformed into a bear during this confrontation, causing the tieflings to back down. Now we try to gain passage while tempers are still running hot.
